helcim package¶

Submodules¶

helcim.development module¶

helcim.facade module¶

helcim.gateway module¶

helcim.gateway.capture()¶

Makes a capture request (to complete a preauthorization)

helcim.gateway.post(url, post_data={})¶

Makes POST to Helcim API and provides response as dictionary.

Parameters:
  • url (str) – URL to the Helcim API.
  • post_data (dict) – The parameters to pass with the POST request.
Returns:

The API response.
Return type:

dict
Raises:

ValueError – TBD.
helcim.gateway.preauthorize()¶

Makes a pre-authorization request

helcim.gateway.purchase()¶

Makes a purchase request

helcim.gateway.refund()¶

Makes a refund request

helcim.gateway.verify()¶

Makes a verification request
